'''''Eremitis ne credite''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete the {{Quest|Through the Predawn Night}}.

==Trivia==
* The name of the achievement is likely a reference to the {{w|Beware of Greeks bearing gifts|famous quote}} ''"Equo ne credite, Teucri!"'' which means "Do not trust the horse, Trojans!"
